name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル2 (猛獣地獄)

description: Level 2 of Impel Down, known as Wild Beast Hell, houses prisoners with bounties exceeding 15,000,000 belly. This tier features various dangerous creatures including Puzzle Scorpions, Manticores, Basilisk, and Sphinx that chase inmates through corridors.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Buggy Explore Level 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Buggy navigate through the dangerous Wild Beast Hell, encountering its various creatures.
keyEvents.significance: Main setting for Luffy's portion of the episode, introducing the dangers of deeper Impel Down levels.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Basilisk
keyEvents.description: Luffy encounters and battles the Basilisk, one of Level 2's most dangerous beasts.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the level's threats and Luffy's combat capabilities.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 3 Discovered on Level 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy reunites with Mr. 3, who has been imprisoned on this level.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Mr. 3's presence and sets up his role in the escape.

statusHistory.reason: Operational prison level during Luffy's infiltration

name.english: Impel Down - Level 4 (Blazing Hell) - Warden's Office
name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル4 (焦熱地獄) - 署長室

description: The office of Impel Down's Chief Warden Magellan, located on Level 4 (Blazing Hell). This is the administrative center of the prison where the warden conducts official business when not dealing with digestive problems.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Reaches Level 4
keyEvents.description: Boa Hancock arrives at Level 4 where Magellan's office is located.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the encounter between Hancock and Magellan.

keyEvents.title: Magellan's Debut
keyEvents.description: Magellan makes his first appearance in his office as the Chief Warden.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the primary antagonist of the arc in his seat of power.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Attacks Magellan
keyEvents.description: Hancock attacks Magellan in his own office for breathing in her direction.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the unusual dynamics of this encounter.

statusHistory.reason: Active administrative center of Impel Down

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル4 (焦熱地獄)

description: Level 4 of Impel Down, known as Blazing Hell, is characterized by extreme heat. This level houses the Chief Warden's office and contains a pool of boiling blood where prisoners are thrown.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Reaches Level 4
keyEvents.description: Hancock travels to Level 4 via elevator with Domino as her guide.
keyEvents.significance: First exploration of Level 4 in the anime.
